name: Car Diagnostics Data Platform
description: Car diagnostics data processing and delivery platform on enhanced Scalable Platform Architecture v2 (SPA2) at Volvo Cars Corporation.

name: Machine IoT Datalake Development
description: A data lake platform for IoT batch and streaming ETL, on-premise data movement, analytics, diagnostics and microservices at Konecranes Global Oy.

name: Edge-IoT and Run Time Data Flow Infrastructure
description: Edge-IoT and microservices infrastructure development project to establish run-time IoT data flow from machines at Konecranes Global Oy.

name: VisuaLynk, BIM-IoT
description: SaaS platform that collects, aggregates, and visually presents data from IoT devices and BIMs at VisuaLynk Oy.

name: SmartPlan: Interactive 2D Floor Plan for Facility Management
description: BIM-enabled software for facility management using interactive floor plans, graph-based semantic data management and granular information retrieval.

name: InBookMode: Interactive Book and Modeling Environment
description: An interactive teaching and learning platform which addresses the segregation problem in AEC-FM and BIM-related teaching and learning.
